verses.verse: וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> were allotted הַגּוֹרָל֙ <S%H1486><s%> There was also a lot לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> for the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he בְּכ֣וֹר <S%H1060><s%> for he [was] the firstborn יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph לְמָכִיר֩ <S%H4353><s%> [to wit] for Machir בְּכ֨וֹר <S%H1060><s%> the firstborn מְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> the father הַגִּלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> were allotted אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> because he was a man מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> of war וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> were allotted ל֖וֹ הַגִּלְעָ֥ד <S%H1568><s%> therefore he had Gilead וְהַבָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> and Bashan

וַ֠יְהִי <S%H1961><s%> become לִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh הַנּוֹתָרִים֮ <S%H3498><s%> There was also [a lot] for the rest לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם֒ <S%H4940><s%> by their families לִבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> for the children אֲבִיעֶ֜זֶר <S%H44><s%> of Abiezer וְלִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and for the children חֵ֗לֶק <S%H2507><s%> of Helek וְלִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> and for the children אַשְׂרִיאֵל֙ <S%H844><s%> of Asriel וְלִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and for the children שֶׁ֔כֶם <S%H7928><s%> of Shechem וְלִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and for the children חֵ֖פֶר <S%H2660><s%> of Hepher וְלִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and for the children שְׁמִידָ֑ע <S%H8061><s%> of Shemida אֵ֠לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these בְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> children מְנַשֶּׁ֧ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph הַזְּכָרִ֖ים <S%H2145><s%> these [were] the male לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> by their families

וְלִצְלָפְחָד֩ <S%H6765><s%> But Zelophehad בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֵ֨פֶר <S%H2660><s%> of Hepher בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גִּלְעָ֜ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מָכִ֣יר <S%H4353><s%> of Machir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> had ל֛וֹ בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> had no sons כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo בָּנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> but daughters וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> and these שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> and these [are] the names בְּנֹתָ֔יו <S%H1323><s%> of his daughters מַחְלָ֣ה <S%H4244><s%> Mahlah וְנֹעָ֔ה <S%H5270><s%> and Noah חָגְלָ֥ה <S%H2295><s%> Hoglah מִלְכָּ֖ה <S%H4435><s%> Milcah וְתִרְצָֽה׃ <S%H8656><s%> and Tirzah

וַתִּקְרַ֡בְנָה <S%H7126><s%> And they came near לִפְנֵי֩ <S%H6440><s%> before אֶלְעָזָ֨ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְלִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H6440><s%> and before יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֗וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun וְלִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> and before הַנְּשִׂיאִים֙ <S%H5387><s%> the princes לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses לָֽתֶת־ <S%H5414><s%> to give לָ֥נוּ נַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> us an inheritance בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among אַחֵ֑ינוּ <S%H251><s%> our brethren וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> he gave לָהֶ֜ם אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> according פִּ֤י <S%H6310><s%> Therefore according to the commandment יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God נַֽחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> them an inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among אֲחֵ֥י <S%H251><s%> the brethren אֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <S%H1><s%> of their father

וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> And there fell חַבְלֵֽי־ <S%H2256><s%> portions מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> to Manasseh עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <S%H6235><s%> ten לְבַ֞ד <S%H905><s%> alone מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> beside the land הַגִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead וְהַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> and Bashan אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which מֵעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> which [were] on the other side לַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> because בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> Because the daughters מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh נָחֲל֥וּ <S%H5157><s%> had נַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> an inheritance בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among בָּנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> his sons וְאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> had the land הַגִּלְעָ֔ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> belonged לִבְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh's הַנּֽוֹתָרִֽים׃ <S%H3498><s%> and the rest

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> ran גְבוּל־ <S%H1366><s%> And the coast מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh מֵֽאָשֵׁ֔ר <S%H836><s%> was from Asher הַֽמִּכְמְתָ֔ת <S%H4366><s%> to Michmethah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> that פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> that [lieth] before שְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H7927><s%> Shechem וְהָלַ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went along הַגְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> and the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַיָּמִ֔ין <S%H3225><s%> on the right hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> unto the inhabitants עֵ֥ין תַּפּֽוּחַ׃ <S%H5887><s%> of Entappuah

לִמְנַשֶּׁ֕ה <S%H4519><s%> [Now] Manasseh הָיְתָ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> belonged אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> had the land תַּפּ֑וּחַ <S%H8599><s%> of Tappuah וְתַפּ֛וּחַ <S%H8599><s%> but Tappuah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> on the border מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> [belonged] to the children אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim

וְיָרַ֣ד <S%H3381><s%> descended הַגְּבוּל֩ <S%H1366><s%> And the coast נַ֨חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto the river קָנָ֜ה <S%H7071><s%> Kanah נֶ֣גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> southward לַנַּ֗חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the river עָרִ֤ים <S%H5892><s%> these cities הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> לְאֶפְרַ֔יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> [are] among עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> the cities מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh וּגְב֤וּל <S%H1366><s%> the coast מְנַשֶּׁה֙ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh מִצְּפ֣וֹן <S%H6828><s%> also [was] on the north side לַנַּ֔חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the river וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become תֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <S%H8444><s%> and the outgoings הַיָּֽמָּה׃ <S%H3220><s%> of it were at the sea

נֶ֣גְבָּה <S%H5045><s%> Southward לְאֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> [it was] Ephraim's וְצָפ֙וֹנָה֙ <S%H6828><s%> and northward לִמְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> [it was] Manasseh's וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> become הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> and the sea גְּבוּל֑וֹ <S%H1366><s%> is his border וּבְאָשֵׁר֙ <S%H836><s%> in Asher יִפְגְּע֣וּן <S%H6293><s%> and they met together מִצָּפ֔וֹן <S%H6828><s%> on the north וּבְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> and in Issachar מִמִּזְרָֽח׃ <S%H4217><s%> on the east

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> had לִמְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <S%H4519><s%> And Manasseh בְּיִשָּׂשכָ֣ר <S%H3485><s%> had in Issachar וּבְאָשֵׁ֗ר <S%H836><s%> and in Asher בֵּית־ שְׁאָ֣ן <S%H1052><s%> Bethshean וּ֠בְנוֹתֶיהָ <S%H1323><s%> and her towns וְיִבְלְעָ֨ם <S%H2991><s%> and Ibleam וּבְנוֹתֶ֜יהָ <S%H1323><s%> and her towns וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֹשְׁבֵ֧י <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants דֹ֣אר <S%H1756><s%> of Dor וּבְנוֹתֶ֗יהָ <S%H1323><s%> and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants עֵֽין־ דֹּר֙ <S%H5874><s%> of Endor וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H1323><s%> and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֤י <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants תַעְנַךְ֙ <S%H8590><s%> of Taanach וּבְנֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H1323><s%> and her towns וְיֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> and the inhabitants מְגִדּ֖וֹ <S%H4023><s%> of Megiddo וּבְנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H1323><s%> and her towns שְׁלֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> [even] three הַנָּֽפֶת׃ <S%H5316><s%> countries

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָכְלוּ֙ <S%H3201><s%> could בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Yet the children מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh לְהוֹרִ֖ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> not drive out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶֽעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> [the inhabitants of] those cities הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these וַיּ֙וֹאֶל֙ <S%H2974><s%> would הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <S%H3669><s%> but the Canaanites לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> dwell בָּאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in that land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> It

וַֽיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> when חָֽזְקוּ֙ <S%H2388><s%> were waxen strong בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Yet it came to pass when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּתְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> that they put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> the Canaanites לָמַ֑ס <S%H4522><s%> to tribute וְהוֹרֵ֖שׁ <S%H3423><s%> but did not utterly לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> out הוֹרִישֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H3423><s%> drive them out ס

וַֽיְדַבְּרוּ֙ <S%H1696><s%> spake בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying מַדּוּעַ֩ <S%H4069><s%> Why נָתַ֨תָּה <S%H5414><s%> Why hast thou given לִּ֜י נַחֲלָ֗ה <S%H5159><s%> to inherit גּוֹרָ֤ל <S%H1486><s%> lot אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> me [but] one וְחֶ֣בֶל <S%H2256><s%> portion אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> and one וַֽאֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רָ֔ב <S%H7227><s%> seeing I [am] a great עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> forasmuch as אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far כֹּ֖ה <S%H3541><s%> has thus בֵּֽרְכַ֥נִי <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> about יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רַ֤ב <S%H7227><s%> them If thou [be] a great אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> [then] get thee up לְךָ֣ הַיַּ֔עְרָה <S%H3293><s%> to the wood וּבֵרֵאתָ֤ <S%H1254><s%> [country] and cut down לְךָ֙ שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> for thyself there in the land הַפְּרִזִּ֖י <S%H6522><s%> of the Perizzites וְהָֽרְפָאִ֑ים <S%H7497><s%> and of the giants כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> since אָ֥ץ <S%H213><s%> be too narrow לְךָ֖ הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> if mount אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H669><s%> Ephraim

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> said בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not יִמָּ֥צֵא <S%H4672><s%> is not enough לָ֖נוּ הָהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> The hill וְרֶ֣כֶב <S%H7393><s%> have chariots בַּרְזֶ֗ל <S%H1270><s%> of iron בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> for us and all the Canaanites הַיֹּשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwell בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> in the land הָעֵ֔מֶק <S%H6010><s%> of the valley לַֽאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּבֵית־ שְׁאָן֙ <S%H1052><s%> [both they] who [are] of Bethshean וּבְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H1323><s%> and her towns וְלַֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> and [they] who [are] of the valley יִזְרְעֶֽאל׃ <S%H3157><s%> of Jezreel

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> unto the house יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph לְאֶפְרַ֥יִם <S%H669><s%> [even] to Ephraim וְלִמְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> and to Manasseh לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> people רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> Thou [art] a great אַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you וְכֹ֤חַ <S%H3581><s%> power גָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> and hast great לָ֔ךְ לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> have לְךָ֖ גּוֹרָ֥ל <S%H1486><s%> lot אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> thou shalt not have one
